chains.name: join_and_observe
chains.description: Join a shard then poll state in a loop.
chains.agent_instructions: Join a shard, then repeatedly poll /process/state each tick. This world is tick-synchronous; do not assume continuous time.

chains.name: play_turn
chains.description: Get state then post a command for the current tick.
chains.agent_instructions: Fetch /process/state for the current tick, decide a command, then POST /process/cmd once per tick.

chains.name: spectate
chains.agent_instructions: Use spectator endpoints to observe shard state. Remember the system advances in discrete ticks.
